00152             function                __construct()
00153             {
00154                   try
00155                   {
00156                         $this->CachedMultyFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00157                         $this->Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00158                         $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00159                   }
00160                   catch( Exception $e )
00161                   {
00162                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00163                   }
00164             }

00180             function                apply_add_limitations()
00181             {
00182                   try
00183                   {
00184                         $PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00185                         $Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00186                         $Config = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( 
00187                               dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_add_limitations' , 'cleaned'
00188                         );
00189                         
00190                         if( $Config != '' )
00191                         {
00192                               $Config = explode( "\n" , $Config );
00193                               
00194                               foreach( $Config as $k => $ConfigLine )
00195                               {
00196                                     $Settings->load_settings( $ConfigLine );
00197                                     $PackageName = $Settings->get_setting( 'package_name' );
00198                                     $PackageVersion = $Settings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00199                                     $AddLimitation = $Settings->get_setting( 'data_limitation' , 'last' );
00200                                     $AddLimitation = $PageComposer->process_string( $Settings , $AddLimitation , $c = false );
00201                                     $Package = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
00202                                     $Package->set_add_limitations( $AddLimitation );
00203                               }
00204                         }
00205                   }
00206                   catch( Exception $e )
00207                   {
00208                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00209                   }
00210             }
00211             
00226             function                get_object()
00227             {
00228                   try
00229                   {
00230                         if( $this->DatabaseAccessObject === false )
00231                         {
00232                               $Config = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( 
00233                                     dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_database_settings'
00234                               );
00235                               $Config = explode( '#' , $Config );
00236                               $this->DatabaseAccessObject = get_package( $Config[ 0 ] , $Config[ 1 ] , __FILE__ );
00237                               
00238                               /* the function get_object is always called before the query execution
00239                               that's why we don't need delayed connection and may connect to the database instantly */
00240                               $this->DatabaseAccessObject->get_connection();
00241                               $this->DatabaseEncoding = $Config[ 2 ];
00242                               $this->DBLogging = intval( @$Config[ 3 ] ) === 1 ? true : false;
00243                               $this->TablenamePrefix = $this->DatabaseAccessObject->TablenamePrefix;
00244                               $this->UserAlgorithms = get_package( 'user::user_algorithms' );
00245                               self::$Session = microtime( true );
00246                               
00247                               $this->apply_add_limitations();
00248                         }
00249                         
00250                         return( $this->DatabaseAccessObject );
00251                   }
00252                   catch( Exception $e )
00253                   {
00254                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00255                   }
00256             }

00274                   self::$QueryName = $theQueryName;
00275             }

00295             function                log_query( $Query , $Start )
00296             {
00297                   try
00298                   {
00299                         $End = microtime( true );
00300                         if( $this->DBLogging )
00301                         {
00302                               $Owner = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_login();
00303                               $DBO->query( 
00304                                     "INSERT INTO umx_action ".
00305                                           "( alias , description , owner , ip , action_date, execute_time , session ) VALUES ( '".
00306                                           htmlspecialchars( self::$QueryName , ENT_QUOTES )."' , '".
00307                                           htmlspecialchars( $Query , ENT_QUOTES )."' , '$Owner' , '".$_SERVER[ 'REMOTE_ADDR' ].
00308                                           "' , NOW() , '".( $End - $Start )."' , '".self::$Session."' )" 
00309                               );
00310                               $DBO->query( 'COMMIT' );
00311                         }
00312                   }
00313                   catch( Exception $e )
00314                   {
00315                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00316                   }
00317             }
00318             
00337             function                query( $Query )
00338             {
00339                   try
00340                   {
00341                         $Start = microtime( true );
00342                         $this->QueryCounter++;
00343                         $DBO = $this->get_object();
00344                         $Query = str_replace( array( '[eq]' ) , array( '=' ) , $Query );
00345                         
00346                         if( $this->DatabaseEncoding != 'UTF-8' )
00347                         {
00348                               $Result = $this->String->iconv( 
00349                                     $this->DatabaseEncoding , 'UTF-8' , $DBO->query( $this->String->compile_ultimix_tags( $Query ) )
00350                               );
00351                         }
00352                         else
00353                         {
00354                               $Result = $DBO->query( $this->String->compile_ultimix_tags( $Query ) );
00355                         }
00356                         
00357                         $this->log_query( $Query , $Start );
00358                         
00359                         return( $Result );
00360                   }
00361                   catch( Exception $e )
00362                   {
00363                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00364                   }
00365             }

00428             function                select( $What , $Tables , $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00429             {
00430                   try
00431                   {
00432                         $this->QueryCounter++;
00433                         $DBO = $this->get_object();
00434                         
00435                         $Result = $DBO->select( $What , $Tables , $Condition );
00436                         
00437                         if( $this->DatabaseEncoding != 'UTF-8' )
00438                         {
00439                               $Result = $this->String->iconv( $this->DatabaseEncoding , 'UTF-8' , $Result );
00440                         }
00441                   
00442                         return( $Result );
00443                   }
00444                   catch( Exception $e )
00445                   {
00446                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00447                   }
00448             }

00963             function                get_list_of_tables()
00964             {
00965                   try
00966                   {
00967                         $this->query_as( DB_ARRAY );
00968                         $Result = $this->query( 'SHOW TABLES' );
00969                         $ListOfTables = $this->fetch_results( $Result );
00970                         
00971                         foreach( $ListOfTables as $i => $TableInfo )
00972                         {
00973                               $ListOfTables[ $i ] = $TableInfo[ 0 ];
00974                         }
00975                         
00976                         return( $ListOfTables );
00977                   }
00978                   catch( Exception $e )
00979                   {
00980                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00981                   }
00982             }

01006             function                get_list_of_fields( $TableName )
01007             {
01008                   try
01009                   {
01010                         $TableName = $this->Security->get( $TableName , 'command' );
01011                         
01012                         $this->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
01013                         $Result = $this->query( "SHOW FIELDS FROM `$TableName`" );
01014 
01015                         return( $this->fetch_results( $Result ) );
01016                   }
01017                   catch( Exception $e )
01018                   {
01019                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01020                   }
01021             }
